data.comment: The match has started at Arena da Baixada.
Ball safe as Paranaense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 4, In Curitiba a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Paranaense have been awarded a corner by Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima.
Thiago Heleno (Paranaense) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 4, Ball goes out of play for a Vasco da Gama goal kick.
Corner awarded to Vasco da Gama.
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama in their own half.
In the minute 8, Free kick for Paranaense in the half of Vasco da Gama.
Throw-in high up the field for Paranaense in Curitiba.
Paranaense are pushing forward but Richard's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 10, Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima awards Vasco da Gama a goal kick.
Paranaense take a 1-0 lead thanks to Maycon Nikao.
That's a fine assist from Richard.
In the minute 11, Paranaense to take a throw-in in Vasco da Gama territory.
Paranaense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Vasco da Gama have a goal kick.
In the minute 15, Throw-in for Paranaense in their own half.
Goal kick for Vasco da Gama at Arena da Baixada.
Throw-in for Vasco da Gama in the half of Paranaense.
In the minute 18, Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a free kick to Paranaense.
Paranaense's Vinicius Abner gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Curitiba.
In the minute 19, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Vasco da Gama are whistled for offside.
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 22, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Renato Kayzer.
Free kick for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Curitiba.
In the minute 25, Throw-in Vasco da Gama.
Throw-in for Paranaense at Arena da Baixada.
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a Paranaense throw-in in Vasco da Gama's half.
In the minute 28, Paranaense's Renato Kayzer looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Can Paranaense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Vasco da Gama's half?
Vasco da Gama's Leo Matos is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 30, Corner awarded to Vasco da Gama.
Paranaense have been awarded a corner by Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima.
Paranaense have been awarded a corner by Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima.
In the minute 35, Free kick Vasco da Gama.
Vasco da Gama are caught offside.
It's now 2-0 in Curitiba as Carlos Eduardo scores for Paranaense.
In the minute 40, Andrey for Vasco da Gama drives towards goal at Arena da Baixada. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Vasco da Gama.
Vasco da Gama pushes forward through Juninho, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 42, Throw-in Paranaense.
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama.
Paranaense awarded a free kick in their own half.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
The first half has been concluded at Arena da Baixada.
In the minute 45, Carlinhos (Vasco da Gama) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 46, The second half has started at Arena da Baixada.
Paranaense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Gustavo Torres is on a sub for Juninho for Vasco da Gama.
Vasco da Gama make their second substitution with Leonardo Gil replacing Vinicius.
In the minute 46, Talles Magno is replacing Marcos Junior for the away team.
Paranaense have a goal kick.
In the minute 47, Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a Vasco da Gama throw-in in Paranaense's half.
Goal kick for Paranaense at Arena da Baixada.
Can Vasco da Gama capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Paranaense's half?
In the minute 48, Throw-in for Paranaense in their own half.
Throw-in for Vasco da Gama at Arena da Baixada.
Vasco da Gama drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 52, Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima awards the away team a throw-in.
Vasco da Gama's Carlinhos gets in a shot on goal at Arena da Baixada. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Vasco da Gama in the half of Paranaense.
In the minute 55, Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a free kick to Paranaense in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Maycon Nikao gets his shot on target but fails to score for Paranaense.
In the minute 55, Vasco da Gama needs to be cautious. Paranaense have an attacking throw-in.
Ball safe as Paranaense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Curitiba Paranaense drive forward through Christian. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 57, Corner awarded to Paranaense.
Free kick for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Gustavo Torres (Vasco da Gama) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 57, Ball goes out of play for a Paranaense goal kick.
Throw-in for Vasco da Gama at Arena da Baixada.
Paranaense have been awarded a corner by Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima.
In the minute 61, Throw-in Vasco da Gama.
Goal! Carlos Eduardo extends Paranaense's lead to 3-0.
Maycon Nikao with an assist there.
In the minute 63, Throw-in for Paranaense in their own half.
Ball safe as Paranaense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Paranaense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Vasco da Gama get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Paranaense's half?
In the minute 64, Walter is replacing Renato Kayzer for Paranaense at Arena da Baixada.
Paulo Autuori is making the team's second substitution at Arena da Baixada with Khellven replacing Jonathan.
In the minute 65, Paranaense to take a throw-in in Vasco da Gama territory.
Paranaense to take a throw-in in Vasco da Gama territory.
Vasco da Gama have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 67, Vasco da Gama have been awarded a corner by Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima.
Vasco da Gama surge into the attack at Arena da Baixada but Werley’s header is off-target.
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima awards Paranaense a goal kick.
In the minute 68, The away team replace Leo Matos with Yago Pikachu.
Vasco da Gama awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Paranaense are coming forward and Walter gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 70, Ball goes out of play for a Vasco da Gama goal kick.
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a throw-in for Paranaense, close to Vasco da Gama's area.
Can Paranaense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Vasco da Gama's half?
In the minute 72, Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a Paranaense throw-in in Vasco da Gama's half.
Throw-in for Vasco da Gama in the half of Paranaense.
Free kick Vasco da Gama.
In the minute 75, Free kick for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Lucho Gonzalez is on a sub for Christian for Paranaense.
Paulo Autuori (Paranaense) is making a fourth substitution, with Fernando Canesin replacing Leo Cittadini.
In the minute 77, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Vasco da Gama to take a throw-in in Paranaense territory.
Throw-in for Vasco da Gama in the half of Paranaense.
In the minute 78, Gustavo Torres of Vasco da Gama gets in a strike, but is off target.
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima awards Paranaense a goal kick.
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Paranaense in the half of Vasco da Gama.
In the minute 79, The away team replace Andrey with Tiago Reis.
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 81, In Curitiba a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Attention is being given to Paranaense’s Richard and play has been suspended briefly.
Paranaense awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 85, Paulo Autuori (Paranaense) has taken off Richard who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Jadson is the replacement.
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a free kick to Paranaense in their own half.
Paranaense's Lucho Gonzalez breaks free at Arena da Baixada. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 87, Goal kick for Vasco da Gama at Arena da Baixada.
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama.
Vasco da Gama's Talles Magno misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 88, It's a goal kick for the home team in Curitiba.
In Curitiba Paranaense attack through Maycon Nikao. The finish is off target, however.
Vasco da Gama have a goal kick.
Vasco da Gama awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Vasco da Gama.
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima awards Paranaense a goal kick.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick for Paranaense in their own half.
Important block from the Vasco da Gama defence as Jadson fires in a strike for Paranaense.
Can Vasco da Gama get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Paranaense's half?
Vasco da Gama attack but Tiago Reis's header doesn't find the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Paranaense goal kick.
Paranaense have been awarded a corner by Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima.
That's full-time at Arena da Baixada. The final score is 3-0.
